name: Nick Scali Furniture
overview:
Nick Scali Furniture is a publicly listed, Australian company that retails and imports furniture such as lounges, dining tables, coffee tables, chairs and entertainment units. It was founded in 1962 by Nick D. Scali.

The company specialises in leather and fabric lounges, as well as dining room and bedroom furniture. They import more than 3,000 containers of furniture per year worldwide, and have distribution centres all across Australia.

Nick Scali Furniture’s core brands include Nick Scali brand, Sofas2Go and Chateau d’Ax. Scali Furniture secured the Australasian rights for the premium Italian retail brand Chateau d’Ax.

The retailer is involved in contributing to a wide range of charities within the community as part of its policies on responsible corporate governance.
